sentence.text: The 58-year-old paternal grandmother of the index patient had mild brachycephaly, laterally flared eyebrows, mild ptosis of the left upper lid, convergent strabism, prominent nose with a bulbous tip, mandibular prognathism and long, posteriorly rotated ears.
Clinodactyly of the 2nd fingers were more obvious than in the proband's father.
She had triangular-shaped nails on the broad 1st toes and had apparently short metatarsal bones.
She told us that her mother had syndactyly of her toes, as well, but she was not accessible for clinical examination.
